title: Beef Fajitas
tagline: Sizzling steak with charred peppers and onions
steps: Mix 2 tbsp oil, lime juice, garlic, cumin, salt, pepper. Marinate steak 30 min to 2 hours.
Cook peppers and onions in remaining oil over high until charred, 8-10 minutes. Transfer out.
Add steak to screaming hot pan. Sear 3-4 minutes per side for medium-rare.
Rest 5 minutes. Slice thin against grain.
Warm tortillas. Serve steak with peppers and onions.
notes: Cast iron gets hot enough for proper char.
